mapper.select: SELECT A.COMM_FILE_ID , A.RANDOM_KEY , A.FILE_NAME , A.FILE_EXTENSION , A.FILE_SIZE FROM COMM_FILE A WHERE A.MODULE_CODE = #{MODULE_CODE} AND A.GROUP_ID = #{GROUP_ID} ORDER BY A.COMM_FILE_ID ASC
SELECT A.FILE_PATH , A.FILE_NAME , A.FILE_EXTENSION , A.SERVER_FILE_NAME FROM COMM_FILE A WHERE A.COMM_FILE_ID = #{COMM_FILE_ID} AND A.RANDOM_KEY = #{RANDOM_KEY}

/* S_COMM_AUTH_GROUP_MENU_CONTEXT */ SELECT 'id_' || (ROWNUM-1) AS "id" , COMM_UTIL_PKG.comm_code_attr('GRID_CONTEXT', C.FUNCTION_CODE, 'NAME', 'KO') AS FUNCTION_NAME , C.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION , B.COMM_GRID_MASTER_ID , C.COMM_GRID_CONTEXT_ID , NVL(D.USE_YN, '0') AS USE_YN FROM COMM_MENU A JOIN COMM_GRID_MASTER B ON A.MENU_CODE = B.MENU_CODE JOIN COMM_GRID_CONTEXT C ON B.COMM_GRID_MASTER_ID = C.COMM_GRID_MASTER_ID LEFT JOIN COMM_AUTH_GROUP_CONTEXT D ON C.COMM_GRID_MASTER_ID = D.COMM_GRID_MASTER_ID AND C.COMM_GRID_CONTEXT_ID = D.COMM_GRID_CONTEXT_ID AND D.COMM_AUTH_GROUP_ID = #{COMM_AUTH_GROUP_ID} WHERE A.COMM_MENU_ID = #{COMM_MENU_ID} AND B.COMM_GRID_MASTER_ID = #{COMM_GRID_MASTER_ID} AND C.USE_YN = '1' ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(COMM_UTIL_PKG.comm_code_attr('GRID_CONTEXT', C.FUNCTION_CODE, 'SEQ', #{LANG_CODE})) ASC

/* S_COMM_AUTH_GROUP_MENU_FUNC */ SELECT 'id_' || (ROWNUM-1) AS "id" , COMM_UTIL_PKG.lang(COMM_UTIL_PKG.function_mlg(A.COMM_FUNCTION_ID), #{LANG_CODE}) as FUNCTION_NAME , A.COMM_MENU_FUNC_ID , NVL(B.USE_YN, '0') AS USE_YN , COMM_UTIL_PKG.comm_code_attr('BTN_AREA', A.BTN_AREA, 'NAME', #{LANG_CODE}) AS BTN_AREA , A.SEQ FROM COMM_MENU_FUNC A LEFT JOIN COMM_AUTH_GROUP_MENU_FUNC B ON A.COMM_MENU_FUNC_ID = B.COMM_MENU_FUNC_ID AND B.COMM_AUTH_GROUP_ID = #{COMM_AUTH_GROUP_ID} WHERE A.USE_YN = '1' AND A.COMM_MENU_ID = #{COMM_MENU_ID} ORDER BY A.BTN_AREA ASC, A.SEQ ASC

/* S_COMM_AUTH_GROUP_MENU */ SELECT 'id_' || (ROWNUM-1) AS "id" , LEVEL-1 AS "indent" , SUBSTR( SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(ROWNUM, '_') , (INSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(ROWNUM, '_'), '_', -1, 2)+1) , (INSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(ROWNUM, '_'), '_', -1) - (INSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(ROWNUM, '_'), '_', -1, 2)+1)) ) -1 AS "parent" , A.COMM_MENU_ID AS COMM_MENU_ID , COMM_UTIL_PKG.lang(A.MLG_CODE, #{LANG_CODE}) AS MENU_NAME , B.COMM_AUTH_GROUP_MENU_ID , NVL(B.USE_YN, '0') AS USE_YN FROM COMM_MENU A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT Y.COMM_AUTH_GROUP_MENU_ID , Y.COMM_MENU_ID , Y.USE_YN FROM COMM_AUTH_GROUP Z JOIN COMM_AUTH_GROUP_MENU Y ON Z.COMM_AUTH_GROUP_ID = Y.COMM_AUTH_GROUP_ID WHERE Z.COMM_AUTH_GROUP_ID = #{COMM_AUTH_GROUP_ID} ) B ON A.COMM_MENU_ID = B.COMM_MENU_ID START WITH A.UP_MENU_CODE IS null CONNECT BY PRIOR A.MENU_CODE = A.UP_MENU_CODE ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.SEQ
/* S_COMM_AUTH_GROUP */ SELECT 'id_' || (ROWNUM-1) AS "id" , A.COMM_AUTH_GROUP_ID , A.GROUP_NANE , A.DESCRIPTION FROM COMM_AUTH_GROUP A ORDER BY A.GROUP_NANE ASC

/* S_COMM_AUTH_GROUP_USER */ SELECT 'id_' || (ROWNUM-1) AS "id" , A.COMM_AUTH_GROUP_USER_ID , A.COMM_AUTH_GROUP_ID , A.COMM_USER_ID , A.DESCRIPTION FROM COMM_AUTH_GROUP_USER A JOIN COMM_USER B ON A.COMM_USER_ID = B.COMM_USER_ID WHERE A.COMM_AUTH_GROUP_ID = #{COMM_AUTH_GROUP_ID} AND B.USE_YN = '1' ORDER BY B.USER_NAME ASC

/* S_COMM_MENU_FUNC */ SELECT 'id_' || (ROWNUM-1) AS "id" , A.COMM_MENU_FUNC_ID , A.COMM_MENU_ID , A.COMM_FUNCTION_ID , A.DESCRIPTION , A.BTN_AREA , A.SEQ , A.TAB_INDEX , A.USE_YN FROM COMM_MENU_FUNC A WHERE A.COMM_MENU_ID = #{COMM_MENU_ID} AND A.USE_YN = '1' ORDER BY A.BTN_AREA ASC, A.SEQ ASC

/* S_COMM_FUNCTION_MENU */ SELECT 'id_' || (ROWNUM-1) AS "id" , LEVEL-1 AS "indent" , SUBSTR( SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(ROWNUM, '_') , (INSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(ROWNUM, '_'), '_', -1, 2)+1) , (INSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(ROWNUM, '_'), '_', -1) - (INSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(ROWNUM, '_'), '_', -1, 2)+1)) ) -1 AS "parent" , #{COMM_FUNCTION_ID} AS COMM_FUNCTION_ID , A.COMM_MENU_ID AS COMM_MENU_ID , COMM_UTIL_PKG.lang(A.MLG_CODE, #{LANG_CODE}) AS MENU_NAME , NVL(B.USE_YN, '0') AS USE_YN FROM COMM_MENU A LEFT JOIN COMM_MENU_FUNC B ON A.COMM_MENU_ID = B.COMM_MENU_ID AND B.COMM_FUNCTION_ID = #{COMM_FUNCTION_ID} START WITH A.UP_MENU_CODE IS null CONNECT BY PRIOR A.MENU_CODE = A.UP_MENU_CODE ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.SEQ

/* S_COMM_USER_BOOKMARK */ SELECT A.COMM_USER_BOOKMARK_ID , A.MENU_CODE , B.MENU_URL , COMM_UTIL_PKG.lang(B.MLG_CODE, #{LANG_CODE}) AS MENU_NAME , A.COMM_USER_ID FROM COMM_USER_BOOKMARK A JOIN COMM_MENU B ON A.MENU_CODE = B.MENU_CODE WHERE A.COMM_USER_ID = #{CID} ORDER BY A.CDT DESC

/* S_COMM_TABLE_DETAIL */ SELECT 'id_' || (ROWNUM-1) AS "id" , A.TABLE_NAME , A.COLUMN_NAME , B.COMMENTS , A.DATA_TYPE , A.DATA_LENGTH , CASE WHEN A.NULLABLE = 'Y' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS NULLABLE FROM ALL_TAB_COLUMNS A JOIN ALL_COL_COMMENTS B ON A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.COLUMN_NAME = B.COLUMN_NAME WHERE A.TABLE_NAME = #{TABLE_NAME} ORDER BY A.COLUMN_ID ASC

/* S_COMM_GRID_COMBO_POPUP */ SELECT 'id_' || (ROWNUM-1) AS "id" , A.COMM_GRID_COMBO_POPUP_ID , A.COMM_GRID_DETAIL_ID , A.PARAM_NAME , A.PARAM_VALUE , A.TARGET , A.USE_YN FROM COMM_GRID_COMBO_POPUP A WHERE A.COMM_GRID_DETAIL_ID = #{COMM_GRID_DETAIL_ID}
AND A.USE_YN = #{USE_YN}

/* S_COMM_GRID_DETAIL */ SELECT 'id_' || (ROWNUM-1) AS "id" , A.COMM_GRID_DETAIL_ID , A.COMM_GRID_MASTER_ID , A.SEQ , A.FIELD , A.MLG_CODE , A.GROUP_MLG_CODE , A.WIDTH , A.TEXT_ALIGN , A.FIELD_TYPE , A.REQUIRE_YN , A.FIXED_YN , A.USE_YN , A.FOOTER , A.DESCRIPTION , A.QUERY_ID FROM COMM_GRID_DETAIL A WHERE A.COMM_GRID_MASTER_ID = #{COMM_GRID_MASTER_ID} ORDER BY A.SEQ

/* S_GRID_MANAGE_MENU */ SELECT 'id_' || (ROWNUM-1) AS "id" , LEVEL-1 AS "indent" , SUBSTR( SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(ROWNUM, '_') , (INSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(ROWNUM, '_'), '_', -1, 2)+1) , (INSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(ROWNUM, '_'), '_', -1) - (INSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(ROWNUM, '_'), '_', -1, 2)+1)) ) -1 AS "parent" , A.COMM_MENU_ID , A.MENU_CODE , COMM_UTIL_PKG.lang(A.MLG_CODE, #{LANG_CODE}) AS MENU_NAME FROM COMM_MENU A WHERE A.USE_YN = '1' START WITH A.UP_MENU_CODE IS null CONNECT BY PRIOR A.MENU_CODE = A.UP_MENU_CODE ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.SEQ

/* S_COMM_CODE_DETAIL */ SELECT 'id_' || (ROWNUM-1) AS "id" , A.COMM_CODE_DETAIL_ID , A.COMM_CODE_MASTER_ID , A.MASTER_CODE , A.DETAIL_CODE , A.MLG_CODE , COMM_UTIL_PKG.lang(A.MLG_CODE, #{LANG_CODE}) AS CODE_NAME , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.SEQ , A.DESCRIPTION , A.ATTRIBUTE1 , A.ATTRIBUTE2 , A.ATTRIBUTE3 , A.ATTRIBUTE4 , A.ATTRIBUTE5 , A.ATTRIBUTE6 , A.ATTRIBUTE7 , A.ATTRIBUTE8 , A.ATTRIBUTE9 , A.ATTRIBUTE10 FROM COMM_CODE_DETAIL A WHERE A.COMM_CODE_MASTER_ID = #{COMM_CODE_MASTER_ID} ORDER BY A.SEQ ASC

/* S_AUTH_MENU_BTN */ SELECT A.FUNCTION_CODE , COMM_UTIL_PKG.lang(A.MLG_CODE, #{LANG_CODE}) AS FUNCTION_NAME , A.ATTRIBUTE1 AS BTN_ID , B.BTN_AREA , B.SEQ , B.TAB_INDEX FROM COMM_FUNCTION A JOIN COMM_MENU_FUNC B ON A.COMM_FUNCTION_ID = B.COMM_FUNCTION_ID JOIN ( SELECT C.COMM_MENU_FUNC_ID , MAX(C.USE_YN) AS USE_YN FROM COMM_AUTH_GROUP A JOIN COMM_AUTH_GROUP_USER B ON A.COMM_AUTH_GROUP_ID = B.COMM_AUTH_GROUP_ID JOIN COMM_AUTH_GROUP_MENU_FUNC C ON A.COMM_AUTH_GROUP_ID = C.COMM_AUTH_GROUP_ID WHERE B.COMM_USER_ID = #{CID} AND C.USE_YN = '1' GROUP BY C.COMM_MENU_FUNC_ID ) C ON B.COMM_MENU_FUNC_ID = C.COMM_MENU_FUNC_ID WHERE B.USE_YN = '1' AND C.USE_YN = '1' AND B.COMM_MENU_ID = #{COMM_MENU_ID} ORDER BY B.SEQ DESC

/* S_MENU_URL */ SELECT A.MENU_URL , A.COMM_MENU_ID , NVL(B.USE_YN, '0') AS USE_YN , A.ATTRIBUTE2 FROM COMM_MENU A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT C.COMM_MENU_ID , MAX(C.USE_YN) AS USE_YN FROM COMM_AUTH_GROUP A JOIN COMM_AUTH_GROUP_USER B ON A.COMM_AUTH_GROUP_ID = B.COMM_AUTH_GROUP_ID JOIN COMM_AUTH_GROUP_MENU C ON A.COMM_AUTH_GROUP_ID = C.COMM_AUTH_GROUP_ID WHERE B.COMM_USER_ID = #{CID} GROUP BY C.COMM_MENU_ID ) B ON A.COMM_MENU_ID = B.COMM_MENU_ID WHERE A.USE_YN = '1' AND A.MENU_CODE = #{MENU_CODE}

/* S_COMM_MENU */ SELECT 'id_' || (ROWNUM-1) AS "id" , LEVEL-1 AS "indent" , SUBSTR( SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(ROWNUM, '_') , (INSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(ROWNUM, '_'), '_', -1, 2)+1) , (INSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(ROWNUM, '_'), '_', -1) - (INSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(ROWNUM, '_'), '_', -1, 2)+1)) ) -1 AS "parent" , COMM_MENU_ID , MENU_CODE , MENU_CODE as TREE_VIEW , MLG_CODE , MENU_URL , UP_MENU_CODE , NVL(USE_YN, '0') AS USE_YN , DESCRIPTION , SEQ , ATTRIBUTE1 , ATTRIBUTE2 FROM COMM_MENU START WITH UP_MENU_CODE IS null CONNECT BY PRIOR MENU_CODE = UP_MENU_CODE ORDER SIBLINGS BY SEQ
